attributes.action: Stop the cuts to the Welfare System.
attributes.additional_details: This will have a negative impact on the lives and wellbeing of millions of British Citizens. This cannot be allowed, as lives are at stake.
attributes.background: Scrap the planned Welfare System cuts introduced on March 18th by Work and Pensions Secretary Liz Kendall.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action:  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721828
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
